trans-unit.source: An XML element that configures the security for a service with endpoints that receive HTTP requests.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement"></xref> class.
Gets an XML element that specifies the security mode for a basic HTTP service.
This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property becomes effective.
A value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that indicates whether transport-level security or no security is used by an endpoint.
The value is not a valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
Gets an XML element that indicates the transport-level security settings for a service endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement> object returned by this property to set the transport security parameters.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> must be set to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.Transport> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly> value for the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property to become effective for the service endpoint.
This value can be set in configuration or in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> constructor.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement"></xref> that specifies the transport-level security settings.

The default values set are a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType"></xref> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.None"></xref>, a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType"></xref> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType.None"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm"></xref> = "".
